data.name: Kitsune: The Journey of Adashino
data.detailed_description:
Summary

One day, a fox girl and her frog friend find themselves on a mysterious island shrouded by darkness but for a few floating lights.
Torii gates, food stall lanterns, and neon signs give light and color to the island. Something is lurking in the shadows, inching ever closer...

Introduction

Kitsune: The Journey of Adashino is a 3D action/adventure game focused on the exploration of a mysterious island inspired by Japanese folklore.The gameplay alternates between exploration and chasing sequences.

During the exploration sequences, you will talk with various characters on the island and will find the secrets. When you find the altars and put the lights on them, they will allow you to explore more areas.

During the chasing sequences, you will run from the monsters. You can use lights to blind the monsters. But be aware, there's a limit to the number of lights you can use. If you find the shrines, you can reload the lights.

The light will also allow you to find the secret paths and hear more from the habitants.



On the horizon, they can see the Tower of Muyo of Adashino Island, shining bewitchingly with the lure of myriad stolen lights.
This is the tale of a long summer night, the night of the Jugoya harvest festival...

data.short_description: "Where will their light lead them?" Fox, a girl who finds herself on Adashino Island and starts travelling with Frog. Neon signs give light and color to the island with a Japanese-inspired atmosphere. Something is lurking in the shadows, inching ever closer...
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750 Ti | AMD Radeon R7 360
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 | AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960 | AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
